description:
Alex ...
Now here is Mike's true shining star. This boy is full of raw sexuality, and eager and to try new things. He begs Mike to suck his dick in this scene but Mike keeps his professional stance and refuses to give into Alex's pleas. I don't think I could have done the same thing if it were me. Alex is the rising star of this group, as you'll soon see. For now, enjoy his first time on video and get used to this one. He's a real keeper.
title: Alex
